thread.title: Nike Chairman Phil Knight writes memoir, due next spring
thread.title_full: Nike Chairman Phil Knight writes memoir, due next spring

title: Nike Chairman Phil Knight writes memoir, due next spring
text: > Entertainment Nike Chairman Phil Knight writes memoir, due next spring FILE - In this Thursday, July 11, 2013, file photo, Phil Knight, the co-founder and chairman of Nike, Inc., walks to the morning session at the Allen & Company Sun Valley Conference in Sun Valley, Idaho. The Scribner imprint of Simon & Schuster Inc. told The Associated Press on Monday, Oct. 5, 2015, that Knight has written a memoir that is scheduled for spring 2016. Currently untitled, the memoir will concentrate on Nikeâ€™s early years, when Knight went into business with Bill Bowerman, his track coach at the University of Oregon, in 1964. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer, File)
